page.title: 16Brunswick Village
page.content: {Brunswick village}is split clean down the middle by the A1 which runs north to south. On the west side of the village there are not many shops, but the ones that are there are close together. There are 3 shops on Grey street, the first is a hairdressing shop called A Cut Above The Rest this shop is a old terraced house converted into a shop. The next two buildings have been connected together into one shop and has had an extension built onto it, the shop is called{Brunswick {stores,}newsagent and general dealers. The last shop on the street is another hairdresser called Weller Hairdresser. Round the corner on{Darrall street}is a butchers called Lewis Balls who is the owner, this also has been converted into a shop. In Greenside Ave is Chapel garage so called as it was an old chapel.
